title: Rail union approves contract, raising hopes the holidays won’t be ruined by an economically devastating strike
dc:creator: Josh Funk, The Associated Press
description: A rail strike could bring supply chains to a standstill and cripple the economy right before busiest shipping season for retailers.
content:encoded: A rail strike could bring supply chains to a standstill and cripple the economy right before busiest shipping season for retailers. Read More
